reviews.text: I appreciate the quality of the food and the convenience of the location‚Äîespecially now that they've clearly improved their service since my last visit. The pizzas were fresh, and everything was ready on time. It's great to see consistent improvements, and this branch has definitely stepped up. A solid option if you're in the Chinatown area and craving something familiar and satisfying.

I visited Pizza Kreta Ayar earlier today and for some reason, this has become my go-to branch. I find the pizza here more delicious compared to other branches, there's just something about the flavor that tastes better, which I think reflects better quality. Service is also fast, and the waiting time is always reasonable and acceptable. The staff are quite friendly and accommodating, especially the manager on duty who made the visit even more pleasant. Keep it up, and maintain the good quality and the taste of the pizza !!!!

I have been to many pizza hut outlet around here in sg but this one make me go into the google search the outlet & leave a feedback‚Ä¶.

I order $10.80 meal for 1 person which had a small personal pizza chicken wings & drumlets.
The taste of the pizza & chicken was beyond my imagination.. The pizza was so delicious cheesy got spices. Got perfect blend of chicken & toppings .
Generally when we order personal pizza from other outlet toppings & cheese all we need to search from micro scope as its budget friendly they totally vanish everything from it. But this outlet no words to say‚Ä¶ everything was so nice so perfect the ambiance the taste & specially the aura of the little girl who was making the pizza.‚Äù PAT‚Äù she was singing  inside the kitchen so lively so energetic so happy that her mood flows to pizza & makes it so amazing‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
PAT if u read my comment i want to say‚Äî‚Äî Be happy & cheerful always. U are so amazing & u are so amazing Pizza chef üë©‚Äçüç≥

Must visit must try this outlet
We can sit & enjoy our hot pizza..

Highly recommended

I ordered a pizza for takeaway, and it was really delicious. The staff at the store are also kind and friendly. They are patient and showed willingness to help customers. I didnt wait long to get my order either. Kudos to this store!

Hi Sir/Madam
Hi I ordered pizza, Really I want to appreciate the staff name Alison for her good service and very polite when I called to store. Thankq so much Alison for service
pizza delivery was quick, and the food arrived hot and well-packaged."
